q.quote: Education is not preparation for life, education is life itself.
q.author: John Dewey

q.quote: Never judge a stranger by his clothes.
q.author: Zachary Taylor

q.quote: When a project has an ample budget, I am interested now in using bigger units of materials.
q.author: Yoshio Taniguchi

q.quote: My success isn't a result of arrogance - it's a result of belief.
q.author: Conor McGregor

q.quote: I'm tired of ignoring that I march to a different beat
q.author: Charlie Sheen

q.quote: The kind of classic pose of a female model is to look kind of sexy and a bit annoyed.
q.author: Caitlin Moran

q.quote: My greatest competition is, well, me.
q.author: R. Kelly

q.quote: It's not the time to look for excuses.
q.author: Rafael Nadal

q.quote: I never wanted to be famous. I only wanted to be great.
q.author: Ray Charles

q.quote: Nothing is softer or more flexible than water, yet nothing can resist it
q.author: Lao Tzu

q.quote: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
q.author: Leo Tolstoy

q.quote: Technology is just a tool. In terms of getting the kids working together and motivating them, the teacher is the most important.
q.author: Bill Gates

q.quote: Any idiot can make money. Keeping money, very few can do.
q.author: John McAfee

q.quote: When you are green, you're growing. When you're ripe, you rot
q.author: Ray Kroc
